entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `deadline_date` TEXT, `deadline_time` TEXT, `start_after_date` TEXT, `start_after_time` TEXT, `scheduled_date` TEXT, `scheduled_time` TEXT, `note` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `updated_at` INTEGER)
CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`name` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`task`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `task` BEGIN DELETE FROM `task_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `task` BEGIN DELETE FROM `task_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `task` BEGIN INSERT INTO `task_fts`(`docid`, `name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`); END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `task` BEGIN INSERT INTO `task_fts`(`docid`, `name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`); END

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `ancestor` INTEGER NOT NULL, `descendant` INTEGER NOT NULL, `depth` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`ancestor`) REFERENCES `task`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`descendant`) REFERENCES `task`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_task_path_ancestor_descendant
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_task_path_ancestor_descendant` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`ancestor`, `descendant`)

indices.name: index_task_path_descendant
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_task_path_descendant` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`descendant`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `created_at` INTEGER, `updated_at` INTEGER)

indices.name: index_tag_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_tag_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)

entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`name` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`tag`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_tag_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `tag` BEGIN DELETE FROM `tag_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_tag_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `tag` BEGIN DELETE FROM `tag_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_tag_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `tag` BEGIN INSERT INTO `tag_fts`(`docid`, `name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`); END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_tag_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `tag` BEGIN INSERT INTO `tag_fts`(`docid`, `name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`); END

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `task_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `tag_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`task_id`) REFERENCES `task`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`tag_id`) REFERENCES `tag`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )
